VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Christine?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Christine is arc {Vincentshire}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Christine?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Christine is arc {Jackfort}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Ryanmouth to Vincentshire in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Ryanmouth to Jackfort in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Christine to Jackfort in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Vincentshire and Jackfort in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Vincentshire and Jackfort is {190}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Angelaview and Ryanmouth in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Angelaview and Ryanmouth is {79}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Angelaview?
SC.A: The total flow output from Angelaview is {171}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Ryanmouth?
SC.A: The total flow input by Ryanmouth is {337}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 180? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {190} from {Vincentshire} to {Jackfort}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 59? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {19} from {Jackfort} to {Ryanmouth}, a flow of {39} from {Ryanmouth} to {Vincentshire}, a flow of {26} from {Vincentshire} to {Ryanmouth}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 81 and 145? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {135} from {Ryanmouth} to {Jackfort}, a flow of {121} from {Christine} to {Ryanmouth}, a flow of {83} from {Ryanmouth} to {Christine}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Jackfort to Vincentshire or from Ryanmouth to Jackfort?
NC.A: The flow from {Jackfort} to {Vincentshire} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Ryanmouth to Angelaview, from Ryanmouth to Christine, or from Jackfort to Ryanmouth?
NC.A: The flow from {Ryanmouth} to {Christine} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Angelaview}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Jackfort} and {Vincentshire}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Vincentshire, Arc Jackfort, Arc Christine, Arc Ryanmouth, Arc Angelaview}.
